title: meliorem
author: meliorem
content: Hi theresome coins available right now just around 0.1082 btc for exchangealso got 4.70 ltc coins readyaccept either Skrill moneybookers or Paypal fundsjust pm here or message via email to: rycoles@sent.com

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on February 16, 2023, 11:51:55 AMWhat's your Telegram?Please you have to be very careful while trading on the forum because nothing is actually guaranteed over here and you wanting to deal with a newbie directly is a very risky one as I have also suffered such loss previously.I think you should get a reputable member of the forum and if you must deal with a newbie account then I would advice the use of an escrow.Please don't get me wrong as I'm not calling anyone a scammer but I'm only trying to warn against newbie accounts.

comments.author: marbet85
comments.body: Quote from: meliorem on February 16, 2023, 03:16:59 AMHi theresome coins available right now just around 0.1082 btc for exchangealso got 4.70 ltc coins readyaccept either Skrill moneybookers or Paypal fundsjust pm here or message via email to: rycoles@sent.comHi, still need it? I have funds on skrill and I can take your BTC, of course escrow here by OgNasty or any high reputation member.)

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on February 23, 2023, 09:20:35 PMQuote from: alterra57 on February 16, 2023, 11:51:55 AMWhat's your Telegram?Please you have to be very careful while trading on the forum because nothing is actually guaranteed over here and you wanting to deal with a newbie directly is a very risky one as I have also suffered such loss previously.I think you should get a reputable member of the forum and if you must deal with a newbie account then I would advice the use of an escrow.Please don't get me wrong as I'm not calling anyone a scammer but I'm only trying to warn against newbie accounts.Thanks for the warning but I've been around for a while. Also have an exchange and lending thread. Would be impossible for me at this point to fall for any of these traps haha.
